title: Picnic
description: Here is a story of American lifeso raw and vital -- so brutal and yet so lyrical, that you well never be able to forget it, the story of a small, quiet community stung into violent awareness of itself by the onslaught of a man who is like a force of nature, a bolt of lightning -- the personification of potent, male sex.He makes every man in town suddenly doubtful of his own manhood. Every woman who looks on him knows, with a sudden fierceness, that she is a woman. To one girl he is the incarnation of her wildest dreams... - from the back cover
author: William Inge
